Posts.Content: emtlady wrote: I am newly diagnosed stage 1-2 with a 1.8 cm mass in one breast.  I opted for bilateral mastectomies with immediate reconstruction.  They have me scheduled in 6 weeks, but I am freaking out thinking that is too long to wait and worried it will spread.  Is this a standard amount of time to wait.  By the time I am actually on the table, it will be 2 months from my biopsy to surgery.  Thank you.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Six week wait until surgery??? emtlady emtlady

Posts.Content: Jun 3, 2012 02:27PM emtlady wrote: Thank you everyone for your replies.    I even considered doing just the mastectomy, they could get me in for that sooner and then the reconstruction in 6 weeks.  I am still considering that, but not sure that insurance or the doc would go for it, plus anesthesia x2, hospital stay x2.  By the time I would get that set up, it would probably be only another 4 weeks to do it all at once.  I just don't know.  Wish this cancer crap came with an instruction book, it makes me feel like I am loosing my mind!
Posts.Title: Six week wait until surgery??? emtlady emtlady
